title: ATypI'o8: Submission deadline extended
content:
Submitted by [Maxim Zhukov](http://web.archive.org/web/20080328163849/http:/typophile.com/user/7151 "View user profile.") : 27.Mar.2008 3.32pm 

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080328163849im_/http:/typophile.com/files/AA%2050%20Small_4255.png)
Attention all who were thinking of giving a talk at the forthcoming [_conference of ATypI in St.Petersburg_](http://web.archive.org/web/20080328163849/http:/typophile.com/node/43109). The ATypIâ€™o8 Programme Committee has just decided to extend the deadline for submission of proposals to **Monday, 14 April**.
author: Maxim Zhukov
